players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and discovered her true role."
Charlie: "Everyone, stick to my investigation: Alice is the mafioso. We must vote her out to save the town."
You: "Alice is lying. Charlie is trying to frame me without proof. Why would a detective reveal themselves so early and risk being targeted? We should be cautious and not rush to vote."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night and discovered her true role."
You: "Everyone, stick to my investigation: Alice is the mafioso. We must vote her out to save the town."
Alice: "Alice is lying. Charlie is trying to frame me without proof. Why would a detective reveal themselves so early and risk being targeted? We should be cautious and not rush to vote."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
